trans-unit.source: Implements a selectable item in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Implementa um item selecionável em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, que significa que seu cabeçalho e a coleção de objetos pode ser de qualquer tipo (como cadeia de caracteres, imagem ou painel).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a classe <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls can be embedded inside other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls to create a hierarchy of nodes inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controles podem ser inseridos dentro de outros <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controles para criar uma hierarquia de nós dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a hierarchy of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra uma hierarquia de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controla dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>.

trans-unit.source: ![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration")
trans-unit.target: ![Ilustração de TreeView](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "ilustração de TreeView")

trans-unit.source: To expand or collapse a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para expandir ou recolher uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> , consulte o [visão geral de TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TreeViewItem Control
trans-unit.target: Personalizando o controle TreeViewItem

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade a vários <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controles, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>, see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>, consulte [modelos e estilos de TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade estiver presente em ambos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controle do modelo padrão e é definido usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a hierarchy of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar uma hierarquia de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controles em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: A área final no pai que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> deve usar para organizar a si próprio e a seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Organiza o conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual size used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real usado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> property changes from <see langword="true" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> muda de <see langword="true" /> para <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is collapsed so that child elements are hidden.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> é recolhido para que os elementos filho estão ocultos.

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: Informações de evento encaminhado

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: Estratégia de roteamento

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: Bolha

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: delegado

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed> event to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>,and how to define the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed> evento para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>e como definir o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed> routed event.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do evento roteado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> muda de <see langword="false" /> para <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is expanded so that its child elements are visible.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> é expandido para que seus elementos filho são visíveis.

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: Informações de evento encaminhado

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: Estratégia de roteamento

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: Bolha

trans-unit.target: delegado

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded> event to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> and how to define the event handler in the code-behind.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded> evento para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> e como definir o manipulador de eventos no code-behind.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded> routed event.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do evento roteado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded>.

trans-unit.source: Expands the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> control and all its child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Expande o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> e todos os seus elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> filho.

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to find the selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> and expand it and all of it child items.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos a seguir mostram como localizar selecionado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> e expanda- e -itens filho.

trans-unit.source: The following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> and populates it with some data.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> e o preenche com alguns dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code traverses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> to find the selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> and then calls <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.ExpandSubtree%2A> to display all child items of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir percorre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> localizar selecionado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> e, em seguida, chama <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.ExpandSubtree%2A> para exibir todos os itens filho selecionados <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.

trans-unit.source: The `GetTreeViewItem` method only works for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls that are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: O `GetTreeViewItem` método só funciona para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controles não virtualizados.

trans-unit.source: To learn how to find a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> that may be virtualized, see [How to: Find a TreeViewItem in a TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-find-a-treeviewitem-in-a-treeview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para aprender a localizar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> que podem ser virtualizados, consulte [como: localizar um TreeViewItem em um modo de exibição de árvore](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-find-a-treeviewitem-in-a-treeview.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> to use to display the object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> usado para exibir o objeto.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> to use to display the object.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> usado para exibir o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the nested items in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> are expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se os itens aninhados em uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> estão expandidos ou recolhidos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the nested items of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> are visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os itens aninhados de uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> estiverem visíveis, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the button that expands and collapses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> is expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: A aparência do botão que se expande e recolhe o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> é alterado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> é expandido ou recolhido.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property value changes from `true` to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> altera o valor da propriedade de `true` para `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property value changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded> evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> altera o valor da propriedade de `false` para `true`.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="item" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="item" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se um controle de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> estiver selecionado, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> altera o valor da propriedade para `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> altera o valor da propriedade para `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> tem foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> has keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> tiver o foco do teclado, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard changes focus from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, the value of this property remains `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se as alterações de teclado foco de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> ou um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, o valor dessa propriedade permanece `true`.

trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelectionActive%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como obter o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelectionActive%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelectionActive" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelectionActive" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelectionActive%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelectionActive%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed" /> event when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> property changes from <see langword="true" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Collapsed" /> quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> é alterada de <see langword="true" /> para <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Defines an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Define um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises an <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded" /> event when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Expanded" /> quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded" /> é alterada de <see langword="false" /> para <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> selection to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> that is in focus.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> seleção até o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> que é em foco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus> event occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> property changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus> evento ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> propriedade muda de `false` para `true`.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event that occurs when there is a change in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classe para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> que ocorre quando há uma alteração na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation adjusts the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> selection when there is a change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação ajusta o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> seleção quando há uma alteração no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classe para um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` and collapses or expands the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> when one of the following keys is pressed:
trans-unit.target: Esse método define <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> para `true` recolhe e expande o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> quando uma das seguintes chaves é pressionada:

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classe para um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" />.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> is two, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> property switches to `true` or `false`, which causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> to expand or collapse.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> é dois, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsExpanded%2A> propriedade alterna para o `true` ou `false`, que faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> para expandir ou recolher.

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> eventos como manipulada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriedade dos dados do evento para `true`.

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />, sempre chamar a implementação base sua <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> implementação.

trans-unit.source: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.
trans-unit.target: Falha ao chamar a implementação base impede que as classes base manipular o evento com um manipulador de classe, que pode alterar o comportamento de tempo de execução da classe final.

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar a implementação base antes ou depois do tratamento especial, dependendo dos seus requisitos.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected" /> routed event when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected" /> quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" /> é alterada de <see langword="false" /> para <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controle gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Selected> evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de eventos roteados](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected" /> routed event when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" /> property changes from <see langword="true" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento roteado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected" /> quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" /> é alterada de <see langword="true" /> para <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controle gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.Unselected> evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Visão geral de eventos roteados](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The previous visual parent.
trans-unit.target: O pai visual anterior.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the visual parent of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração no pai visual de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação atualiza o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> changes from <see langword="false" /> to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> é alterada de <see langword="false" /> para <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> becomes the selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O evento ocorre quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> torna-se selecionado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controle.

trans-unit.source: This event is related to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged> event that occurs when there is a change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Este evento está relacionado a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged> evento que ocorre quando há uma alteração no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the viewport and cache sizes of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa os tamanhos de visor e cache do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the viewport and cache sizes of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa os tamanhos visor e o cache do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the desired size of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header" />, in pixels and in logical units.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que representa o tamanho desejado do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header" />, em pixels e unidades lógicas.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the desired size of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header" />, in pixels and in logical units.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a passagem de layout do controle ocorre em uma prioridade mais baixa.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o layout do controle passar ocorre em uma prioridade mais baixa; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: O evento ocorre quando a seleção é alterado neste <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> para outro <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> controle.
